message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $13500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Can we meet in the middle at $12000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but $12000 is a bit lower than I was thinking. I can do $13200, and I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $12500?
I understand you're on a tight budget, but I think you'll find the product is worth more than $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about $13250?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $13250 is a bit too high. Can we try $12000 again? I'm willing to meet you halfway from there, so $12500 would be a good compromise for me.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go back to $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $13250, which would be $13000. That's the best I can do.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $13000, so I'll offer $12500
